name: Game of Glitches - Episode One
description:
Game of Glitches - Episode One puts you in charge of the king Robert Baglitcheon in his mighty and noble quest to save Glitch's Landing and all the people of the continent of Glitcheros from the data corruption that hit the server.

Fight evil skeletons and slay mighty dragons while collecting various quest items in the corrupted lands of this game.

Features:

  • A complex combat system.
  • Over two million lines of dialogue.
  • Ultra realistic graphics.
  • Glitches and lies, lots of lies.

This is the fifth game in my "One Game a Week" project. Although my computer broke several times and I had only about one day to make the game, I'm really proud of what I made, and it has a lot of room to expand. Made for the #glitchjam

To know when updates and more games come out, be sure to follow me on Twitter: @OPC_Eadow
